name: Transferring Files with Credential Data via Network Shares
description: Transferring files with well-known filenames (sensitive files with credential data) using network shares
false_positives: Transferring sensitive files for legitimate administration work by legitimate administrator
query: (winlog.channel:Security AND winlog.provider_name:/[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\-[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\-[Ss][Ee][Cc][Uu][Rr][Ii][Tt][Yy]\-[Aa][Uu][Dd][Ii][Tt][Ii][Nn][Gg]/ AND event.code:5145 AND winlog.event_data.RelativeTargetName:(/.*\\[Mm][Ii][Mm][Ii][Dd][Rr][Vv].*/ OR /.*\\[Ll][Ss][Aa][Ss][Ss].*/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Mm][Ii][Nn][Ii][Dd][Uu][Mm][Pp]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Hh][Ii][Bb][Ee][Rr][Ff][Ii][Ll].*/ OR /.*\\[Ss][Qq][Ll][Dd][Mm][Pp][Rr].*/ OR /.*\\[Ss][Aa][Mm].*/ OR /.*\\[Nn][Tt][Dd][Ss]\.[Dd][Ii][Tt].*/ OR /.*\\[Ss][Ee][Cc][Uu][Rr][Ii][Tt][Yy].*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:Security AND winlog.provider_name:Microsoft\-Windows\-Security\-Auditing AND event.code:5145 AND winlog.event_data.RelativeTargetName:(*\\mimidrv* OR *\\lsass* OR *\\windows\\minidump\\* OR *\\hiberfil* OR *\\sqldmpr* OR *\\sam* OR *\\ntds.dit* OR *\\security*))`
